entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 02 March 2023
